pizzerias.name: Pizza Slice
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaiian Paradise (tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, fresh pineapple, jalapeño)
pizzerias.description: New York-style pizza by the slice in the heart of Ebisu. Their Hawaiian Paradise pizza adds jalapeños for a spicy kick to balance the sweetness of the pineapple.

pizzerias.name: PST Pizza Studio Tamaki
pizzerias.specialty: Ananas Special (San Marzano tomatoes, fior di latte, prosciutto cotto, caramelized pineapple)
pizzerias.description: Acclaimed pizzeria run by Tsubasa Tamaki, who trained under legendary pizzaiolo Susumu Kakinuma. Their pineapple pizza uses caramelized fruit for enhanced flavor and balance.

pizzerias.name: Savoy Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Tropical Naples (tomato sauce, mozzarella, Italian ham, fresh pineapple, basil)
pizzerias.description: Local pizza institution started by the owner of Seirinkan, featuring Neapolitan-style pizzas with a Japanese touch. Their Hawaiian offering uses fresh, not canned, pineapple for superior flavor.

pizzerias.name: Pizzeria e Braceria L'Insieme
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaii Fusion (tomato sauce, mozzarella, prosciutto cotto, pineapple, Japanese shiso leaves)
pizzerias.description: Named one of the world's best pizzerias by 50 Top Pizza, L'Insieme offers creative takes on classic pies. Their Hawaiian variation adds Japanese shiso leaves for a unique East-meets-West flavor profile.

pizzerias.name: 800 Degrees Neapolitan Pizzeria
pizzerias.address: 5F Otemachi Park Building, 1-1-1 Otemachi, Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo 100-0004
pizzerias.specialty: Custom Hawaiian (tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, fresh pineapple with optional add-ons)
pizzerias.description: International chain serving Neapolitan-style pizzas cooked at 800 degrees Fahrenheit. Their build-your-own concept allows customers to customize their Hawaiian pizza with additional toppings.

pizzerias.name: Devilcraft
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaiian Devil (Chicago deep-dish with tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, pineapple, jalapeños)
pizzerias.description: American-style craft beer and pizza pub specializing in Chicago deep-dish pizzas. Their Hawaiian offering comes on a thick, buttery crust with generous toppings.

pizzerias.name: Pizzeria Da Isa
pizzerias.specialty: Tropicale (San Marzano tomatoes, fior di latte, prosciutto, fresh pineapple, mint)
pizzerias.description: Award-winning pizzeria run by Hisanori Yamamoto, who won multiple pizza-making trophies in Naples. Their Hawaiian pizza adds fresh mint for a refreshing twist.

pizzerias.name: Pizza Strada
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaiana (tomato sauce, smoked mozzarella, prosciutto cotto, pineapple, basil)
pizzerias.description: Ranked among the world's top 100 pizzerias, Pizza Strada is known for perfectly executed wood-fired classics and seasonal specials. They use smoked mozzarella on their Hawaiian pizza for added depth.

pizzerias.name: Tonari no Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Aloha (tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, pineapple, sweet corn)
pizzerias.description: Casual neighborhood pizzeria offering affordable Japanese-style pizzas. Their Hawaiian pizza includes sweet corn, a popular topping in Japan.

pizzerias.name: The Pizza Bar on 38th
pizzerias.address: 38F Mandarin Oriental Tokyo, 2-1-1 Nihonbashi-Muromachi, Chuo-ku, Tokyo 103-8328
pizzerias.specialty: Ananas (San Marzano tomatoes, buffalo mozzarella, prosciutto cotto, pineapple confit, fresh basil)
pizzerias.description: Luxury pizzeria located on the 38th floor of the Mandarin Oriental Hotel, ranked 16th in the world by 50 Top Pizza. Chef Daniele Cason's Hawaiian pizza features pineapple confit for an elegant take on the classic.
